questions.question: What is the primary color of the product packaging?
What is the overall shape of the product's packaging?
What material appears to constitute the product's packaging?
What is the predominant color of the brand logo on the package?
What is the text prominently displayed on the product packaging?
What kind of image is shown on the product's packaging?
What appears to be the texture of the product's packaging?
What is the apparent condition of the product's seal?
Does the packaging display any significant graphical elements besides the logo?
Does the image on the package accurately depict the contained product?
Is there any indication of weight or quantity on the packaging?
What is the orientation of the text on the packaging?
Is the packaging transparent or opaque?
Are there any visible tears or damages on the packaging?
What is the size of the product shown in the image relative to a human hand?
